page.title: 12MOSSTOWIE SCHOOL
page.content: The school is now reduced to two full time teachers but has five visiting teachers of various subjects.There are thirty nine pupils,twenty six boys and thirteen girls which causes problems in sports and other school events. Being such a small school financial pressure means we are unable to obtain expensive equipment but because the school is so well looked after we get money from the clerk of works to improve the school facilities. 80% of the pupils have always been at Mosstowie School. The majority of the pupils like it here because their fellow friends and teachers are friendly.P.E.,H.E.and maths are the most popular subjects and the pupils also like swimming.Pupils commented that there is a need for better toilet facilaties and more gym equipment.
